name: Evergreen
shortDescription: A gamified platform for the Eco-Escolas program, helping students engage in educational activities.
description: Evergreen is a digital platform designed to enhance the Eco-Escolas educational experience for students of all ages. Developed over a school year, it helps students organize activities and stay engaged through an intuitive, gamified interface.

name: Training Wheels
shortDescription: A video platform to make learning traffic regulations engaging and interactive.
description: Training Wheels was my first major college project, where we aimed to develop a video platform focused on road code.

name: Eco-Meow
shortDescription: A fun educational game that teaches players about proper waste sorting and recycling.
description: Eco-Meow is a charming game designed around the Eco-Escolas theme. It offers a fun and educational experience by teaching players which items belong in which recycling bin.

name: Eco-Meow 2.0
shortDescription: An enhanced 3D version of Eco-Meow with cooperative gameplay and environmental themes.
description: Eco-Meow 2.0 builds on the original Eco-Meow with improved graphics and new cooperative gameplay elements.

name: Anda
shortDescription: A redesigned transit app for Metro do Porto to improve commuter experience.
description: Anda is an app designed for Metro do Porto that replaces the traditional transit card with a digital solution.

name: Cinema Trindade
shortDescription: A UI/UX redesign project for Cinema Trindade, improving usability and design.
description: Given the task of improving the user experience of a platform, we redesigned the interface for Cinema Trindade.
